p: In the present study, cytokine analysis of DCs supernatant after crude BSEO treatment revealed a significant increase in the levels of the anti-inflammatory cytokine IL-10 secretion and reduced levels of inflammatory cytokine IL-12. Since IL-10 cytokine causes a reduction of antigen-presenting and costimulatory molecules on DCs [ 67, 68], this may provide a rational for the observed tolerogenic properties of DCs and supports the conclusion that BSEO regulates DCs functions and reinforces a state of immunotolerance.
